title: Cooking Day
snippet:
Yesterday i made a tray of yeast following this recipe
WikiHow

This create 27 yeast blocks of around 0.6 ounces each. I left these drying
overnight and today i will make bread and freeze a load of these.

title: Rainy Day
snippet:
